SEARCH
Package net.tangly.erp.ledger.services

Interface LedgerRealm

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, net.tangly.core.domain.Realm
All Known Implementing Classes:
LedgerEntities
public interface LedgerRealm extends net.tangly.core.domain.Realm
The ledger implements a ledger with a chart of accounts and a set of transactions. It provides the logic for the automatic processing of VAT amounts and related bookings to the VAT related accounts.

    • addVat

      default void addVat(@NotNull @NotNull Transaction transaction)
      Adds a transaction to the ledger and the referenced accounts. A warning message is written to the log file if one of the involved accounts is not registered in the ledger. The involved accounts cannot be aggregate accounts.
      Parameters:
      transaction - transaction to add to the ledger

    • build

      Build the account tree structure and perform basic validation.
